name: No Name Space Game
description:
This is my first game build. This is a work in progress.

You can click on the word "Start" to get the game going.

You move the spaceship with the arrow or WASD keys.

To fire the laser, use the left mouse click or the CTRL key.

The power indicator in the upper left corner will run out if you do not refill it along the way.

Have fun.
